attributes.additional_details:
please help the people of Burma who are being slaughtered by the  bhudhist monks and military on a mass scale.  more than 20,000 killed -more than 1000 killed in just yesterday alone ,Hundreds of villages have been burnt down, often several times,Civilians are killed, women are raped, villagers' food is burnt, their livestock is killed and medical facilities are systematically destroyed as part of the regime's policy of "Burmisation" in the east.
the genocide is happening right now as if it is holocaust all over again,please help nothing has been done to save the people
please stop the genocide in burma!
please save the PEOPLE!
